title: 貓會唔會感染「武漢肺炎」病毒？

replies.msg:
最近有幾則報導，包括東張西望訪問獸醫蕭嘉和，話貓狗唔會感染武漢肺炎病毒。佢話因為武漢肺炎病毒S蛋白係同受害者細胞ACE2受體結合，而貓狗係用APN受體結合，所以就唔會感染。

呢個邏輯有啲唔妥，雖然貓狗中流行嘅冠狀病毒係同受害者細胞APN受體結合，但唔代表新冠狀病毒(SARS-CoV-2)唔會同貓ACE2受體結合。

2003年，淘大花園有貓隻驗到曾被沙士病毒感染。同年，國際權威科學雜誌《自然》（Nature）刊登過一項由一組荷蘭科學家進行嘅研究，佢哋將從一名香港病人獲得嘅沙士病毒，氣管內接種予六隻家貓及六隻雪貂。結果所有動物都受感染，家貓冇臨床病徵但會播毒，而另外冇被接種沙士病毒嘅兩隻家貓及兩隻雪貂，都分別被同類傳染：
https://www.nature.com/articles/425915a
註：文中SCV 係SARS Coronavirus沙士冠狀病毒簡稱
"...No clinical signs were seen in SCV-inoculated cats, whereas three out of six ferrets became lethargic from days 2–4 p.i. and one of these ferrets died 4 days p.i. All cats and ferrets shed SCV from the pharynx, starting at 2 days p.i. and continuing until days 10 and 14, respectively, as demonstrated by polymerase chain reaction with reverse transcription (RT-PCR). The virus was isolated from all pharyngeal swabs taken on days 2–8 p.i. and from nasal swabs taken from two cats on days 4 and 6 p.i.

Infection of the respiratory tract was evident in all animals tested: SCV was isolated from the trachea and lungs...

Non-inoculated cats (n = 2) and ferrets (n = 2) that were housed with the inoculated cats and ferrets, respectively, became infected with SCV"

2003年SARS-CoV病毒同現時造成武漢肺炎(COVID-19)嘅SARS-CoV-2病毒，同樣係透過與受害者細胞表面受體蛋白ACE2結合。既然SARS-CoV病毒可以感染貓，又點能夠武斷講SARS-CoV-2病毒一定唔會感染貓。

《Journal of Virology》最近一篇論文推論武漢肺炎病毒好大可能可以與多種動物ACE2受體結合：
https://jvi.asm.org/content/early/2020/01/23/JVI.00127-20
"2019-nCoV RBD likely recognizes ACE2 from pigs, ferrets, cats, orangutans, monkeys and humans with similar efficiency, because these ACE2 molecules are identical or similar in the critical virus-binding residues."

所以喺未有科學觀察研究之前，現階段唔能夠講究竟貓會唔會感染新冠狀病毒
